name: Kanso
description:
Kanso is your moment of Zen.
A relaxing game of motion, pause, and flow.
Immerse into a colourfully ambient space, effortlessly glide through each of the worlds, finding a growing sense of peace and a progression toward apotheosis.

Add Kanso to your wishlist to get notified of its release.


Inspired by the Zen calligraphy practice of Ensô, where every day you paint an uninhibited ink circle on a blank sheet of paper.
Expressing a physical moment of reflection, focus, and freedom of flow.
Kanso is carefully balanced to invoke the flow of this calligraphic practice as a unique gameplay experience.


Navigate through ten worlds and explore over three hundred levels.
Each level with a different circular shape to follow and guiding energies to avoid.
Move with each guiding energy, a Daemon following its own distinct movement pattern. Some follow you, others avoid you, all of them moving in predictable paths that gently draw you into a tranquil gaming experience.


Along the player’s journey they will encounter our breathing session, a place where the Ensô breathes along with you while calming music is played.
Inspired by Resonant Breathing, the practice of slowing your breathing rate to approximately six breaths per minute. Slowing your heart rate variability, and resulting in a calm, de-stressed state of mind.


Perfectly balanced for all input types, play with controller, touchscreen, mouse, or even a directional pad!


I created Kanso to be a place of beauty and refuge from the noise of daily life. To bring players of every skill level into a meditative state of flow, into an immersion of a calming experience.

I hope you join me and find your own moment of Zen.
